sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/Confirmationpage.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useFlight } from '../context/Flight' import axios from 'axios' const Confirmationpage = () => { const { createPdf, getPdf } = useFlight() const download = async() => { const {data} = await axios.get(`/myflight?_id=${localStorage.getItem('BookingID')}`); const pbdata = data if(pbdata.success){ const {data} = await axios.get(`/getpassofbook?_id=${localStorage.getItem('BookingID')}`) const bpdata = data if(bpdata.success){ createPdf(localStorage.getItem('BookingID'),bpdata.passenger, pbdata.flights) .then(()=> getPdf()) } } } return (
{!localStorage.getItem('bookingstatus')?
Your Booking was successfull
BOOKING ID:
{localStorage.getItem('BookingID')}
{localStorage.getItem('token')?My Bookings:<>}
:
Your Booking was unsuccessfull
BOOKING ID:
{localStorage.getItem('BookingID')}
{localStorage.getItem('token')?My Bookings:<>}
}
) } export default Confirmationpage
